availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Andrew J. Stoner (Brown County, IL, physician)

body.p: Brown County, Illinois, physician. Ohio native. Physician in Pike County, Illinois, in 1850. Physician in Versailles, Illinois, in 1860. Physician in Mount Sterling in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Illinois, Pike County, Township 3S2W, p. 35B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Illinois, Brown County, Versailles, p. 781.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Brown County, IL, July 1863, p. 515.
"Dr Andrew J. Stoner (1824-1901)," Find A Grave, Memorial #15454221, accessed August 24, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/15454221.
